biotools.summary: Method to identify upstream regulators likely responsible for observed patterns in genome-wide gene expression. By integrating ChIP-seq/chip and position-weight-matrices (PWMs) data, protein-protein interactions, and kinase-substrate phosphorylation reactions, it can better identify regulatory mechanisms upstream of genome-wide differences in gene expression.
